data.name: Fishing Planet: Virtual Bass Open Pack
data.detailed_description:
Fishing Planet is hosting its annual Virtual Sportfishing Tournament that’s all about catching some big Bass! This is the one fishing event that makes you want to get armed to the bone with the best tackle possible! And so to fulfill the need, we’re introducing this Tournament-level Pack to match the occasion! Virtual Bass Open Pack contains a selection of premium grade rods, reels, lures and other tackle that’ll make you feel certain of victory. Including ultimate Bass fishing goodies like the VBO Caster rod and VBO Casting Reel, plus lots of different jig heads, bass jigs, craws and spinnerbaits that are sure to get champion Bass coming your way!
Virtual Bass Open Pack is a complete all-in-one Tournament tackle setup to enhance your competitive performance and take you to Victory!

Virtual Bass Open Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use your Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses. Spend your credits wisely!
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 7-DAY PREMIUM Enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and Credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 45 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setups Slots

RODS ‘N REELS:
Rods:
* VBO Caster 7' 3" (220) - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8–1 3/7 Oz. (10-40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb. (3.5-10.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* VBO Caster 7' 10" (240) - Length: 7' 10" (2.4 m); Lure Weight: 1/2–1 5/8 Oz. (14-45 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 9–24 Lb. (4-11 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
Reels:
* VBO Reel 3500 S - Ratio: 7.2:1; Recovery: 33.5" (85 cm); Capacity: mono 12/120 (0.3/120), braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 22 Lb. (10 kg)
* VBO Reel 3500 P - Ratio: 6.2:1; Recovery: 29.5" (75 cm); Capacity: mono 12/120 (0.3/120), braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb. (10.5 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE - a selection of best tackle to help you in your fight for victory!
* Lines:
Braid .009" (0.23 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
* Bass Jig: Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g) #4/0 (х3); Bass Jig 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0 (х3); Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g) #2/0 (х3)
* Jig Heads: Jig Head 1/2 Oz. (14 g) #2/0; Jig Head 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0; Jig Head 6/7 Oz. (25 g) #4/0; Jig Head 1 Oz. (30 g) #6/0
* Craws and Creatures: Craw 2" (5 cm) (х2); Newts 3" (7.5 cm) (х2); Newts 4" (10 cm) (х2); Nymphes 3" (7.5 cm) (х2); Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (х2)
* TopWater Lures: Frog 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0 (x2); Popper 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #4/0 (x3)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 1/2 Oz. (14 g) #2/0 (х2); Spinnerbait 1 Oz. (28 g) #4/0 (х2)

EQUIPMENT – Some useful items to match and complete some of the best Tournament tackle
* VBO Fishing Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* VBO Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* FishCabin M - Max Single Fish Weight: 15 Lb. (7 kg); Total Fish Weight: 66 Lb. (30 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

FISHING LICENSES (7 DAYS):
* Advanced Missouri License
* Advanced North CarolinaLicense
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced Louisiana License
* Advanced Florida License

data.short_description: Fishing Planet is hosting its annual Virtual Sportfishing Tournament that’s all about catching some big Bass! This is the one fishing event that makes you want to get armed to the bone with the best tackle possible! And so to fulfill the need, we’re introducing this Tournament-level Pack to match the occasion!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

package_groups.title: Buy Fishing Planet: Virtual Bass Open Pack

subs.option_text: Fishing Planet: Virtual Bass Open Pack - 19,99€
